metadata.synopsis: If players will free Hope and she enters the Archive, Archivist will have a comment on that
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2.teleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_ArchiveADTrigger3. Free Hope through debug options

0.speaker: Archivist
0.text: Hope? Here? She is not permitted to stretch her legs - we stretch them for her.
